CSS_mediaVideo-dynamic-range.summary: The video-dynamic-range CSS media feature can be used to test the combination of brightness, contrast ratio, and color depth that are supported by the video plane of the user agent and the output device.

remarks.para: Some user agents, including many TVs, render video and graphics in two separate planes (bi-plane) with distinct screen characteristics. The video-dynamic-range feature is used to test the characteristics in the video plane.
